moves.name: Zen Headbutt
moves.effect: Has a chance (20%) of making the target flinch.

moves.name: X Attack All
moves.effect: Raises the Attack of all allied sync pairs by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Strike Together!
moves.effect: Raises the Attack and Speed of all allied sync pairs by 1 stat rank.

passives.name: Antitoxin
passives.description: Prevents the user from getting poisoned or badly poisoned.

passives.name: Flameproof
passives.description: Prevents the user from getting burned.
